workExperience.description:
• Developed over 15 engaging educational games tailored specifically for children, enhancing learning experiences.
• Achieved the successful sale of an innovative educational app, showcasing expertise in the ed-tech market.
• Led the end-to-end development process, ensuring all educational games met high-quality standards and user engagement.
• Built a robust portfolio of kids' games, contributing to a compelling app that was well-received in the market.

• Developed multiple MR applications tailored specifically for the unique needs of construction site workers
• Led a team to enhance MR apps, ensuring higher efficiency and safety in the construction processes
• Achieved seamless integration of MR technologies, resulting in a 20% reduction in task execution time
• Built user-friendly interfaces in MR apps that improved worker engagement and operational accuracy on-site

projects.title: Tero AI
projects.description:
• Developed an advanced cold emailing tool specifically tailored to streamline SDR outreach efforts.
• Integrated personalization features within the tool to enhance engagement rates and improve response rates.
• Automated follow-up sequences to ensure consistent communication and reduced manual effort for SDRs.
• Implemented analytics to track email performance, providing SDRs actionable insights for optimizing campaigns.

projects.title: Resume Genie
projects.description:
• Developed an AI tool to generate professional resumes customized to job descriptions for increased relevance.
• Implemented advanced NLP algorithms to match resume content accurately with specific job roles and requirements.
• Led the implementation of AI tools to automate resume content generation, streamlining the resume creation process.

achievements.title: Stand Up Comedian
achievements.description: Performed as a successful stand-up comedian captivating diverse audiences.

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: Won the first prize in the Hackathon organized by the college.

achievements.title: Public Speaker
achievements.description: Delivered impactful speeches at various events and conferences.
